name: Feathers & Powers
description:
A mysterious force has taken control of the forest ! Strange hazards have appeared and BIRDS have been trapped inside force fields
Your goal is simple : FREE the birds and use their powers to help you find and destroy the source of this invasion.

This game was made by W00shy and To_Steal_Is_Bad for My First Game Jam Summer 2021 with the theme ✨Free✨.

Controls :

  • WASD, ARROW KEYS + Space Bar to move
  • E or X to Interact
  • M to Mute
  • R to Restart the current level

You can play the game in your browser or download the executable file for Windows. We recommend using the executable file as the browser version might be slower and have a few audio issues.

Credits :

  • Bird Sprite by ma9ici4n 
  • Parallax BackGround by aamatniekss
  • Forest Tileset by mamanezakon
  • Font by petrnita

  • SFXR for the rest of the sound effects 
  • Bosca Ceoil for the "music"
